summary:
- **Leadership Change**: Robert Cooper appointed as new Managing Director & CEO effective 2 July 2025, replacing founder Gavin Loyden. Cooper brings 30+ years of global mining experience (ex-MD/CEO of New Century Resources, Round Oak Minerals, senior roles at BHP, etc.).  
- **Julia Creek Project**: Confirmed JORC Mineral Resource of 2,870Mt @ 0.31% V2O5 (one of largest ASX-listed vanadium resources) with contingent oil resources (6.3–654 MMbbls). No material updates to resource estimates.  

*No material trading/capital markets impacts identified.* (Announcement focuses on leadership transition and project recap without new operational/financial data or capital actions.)
